doc.donations:
A donation is a gift for charity, humanitarian aid, or to benefit a cause. A donation may take various forms, including money, alms, services, or goods such as clothing, toys, food, or vehicles. A donation may satisfy medical needs such as blood or organs for transplant.
[Wikipedia]

doc.skills:
A skill is the learned ability to perform an action with determined results with good execution often within a given amount of time, energy, or both. Skills can often be divided into domain-general and domain-specific skills. For example, in the domain of work, some general skills would include time management, teamwork and leadership, self-motivation and others, whereas domain-specific skills would be used only for a certain job.
[Wikipedia]

doc.about: Listings is here to let anyone post on the internet, but seriously and for free. Like newspapers and magazines, Listings has these three main sections: Donnations, Artworks and Blog posts.

listings.title: Classified-ads - All sections
listings.intro: Classified advertising brought to the web. Here you can enjoy non-commercial listings for free
listings.success: We got latest listings from all sections :)

donations.title: Classified-ads - {{section}}
donations.intro: Share or look for used items nextdoor. Give a second life to your old clothes, furniture, electronics etc.
donations.success: We got some of the latest donations :)

events.title: Classified-ads - {{section}}
events.intro: Call for cultural or hobbies meetups. Today you are no longer disconnected. Get in touch with organizers and socialize easily.
events.success: We got some of the latest events :)

skills.title: Classified-ads - {{section}}
skills.intro: Let people know about your skills and grow your business. You can also join others, skillsharing is a cost-effective way to learn professional skills. Even more, your special car is scratched ? You can ask for help.
skills.success: We got some of the latest skills :)

hobbies.title: Classified-ads - {{section}}
hobbies.intro: Talk freely about your hobbies. Find friends with similar hobbies by talking about it.

blogs.title: Classified-ads - {{section}}
blogs.intro: Creative passions, hobbies and pastimes! Any topic could fall here so feel free to share your thoughts.

gwoogl.title: Classified-ads - Search results
gwoogl.intro: Classified advertising brought to the web. Use our search to find the best results even in different languages !
gwoogl.success: We got some listings for your search :)

geolocation.title: Classified-ads - Geolocated results
geolocation.intro: Classified advertising brought to the web. Use geo-location search to find listings nearby !

POST_ERR.intro: Classified advertising brought to the web. Unfortunately, your new listing was not posted because of an error. Please try again.
